entity.name: Global Open Source Softwares (GOSS)
entity.description: Global Open Source Softwares (GOSS) is an organization backing the Fingerprint OSS project, which provides a free and open-source client-side fingerprinting library.

projects.name: Fingerprint OSS
projects.description: A free and open source client-side fingerprinting library that logs user information and identifies unique visitors with high accuracy. It is backed by Cloudflare OSS.
